thread.title: Nigel Bourke

author: Nigel Bourke
title: Nigel Bourke
text:
I ordered 4 blinds, 2 wooden Venetian blinds and 2 blinds for our Fakro Windows.
The orders arrived within the times advised and I was impressed by the quality.
The Fakro window blinds were easy to fit and well made I had reservations about them not being Fakro originals but I needn't have worried - great value
The Venetian blinds were real wood and excellent quality. I paid over twice the price for other blinds in my house from a well known partnership and I can honestly say they are as good and possibly better.
Fitting was straight forward and they look great, I will definitely be buying the remainder of our blinds from here, no hesitation recommending Blinds2Go
